issue.title: [CF 1482] Arena trigger some times doesn't work
issue.body:
When you change zone, when you enter on arena zone, exctaly only Ruins of Lordaeron and Blade's Edge Arena some times group conditions for IF ARENA or BATTLEGROUND isn't working, its a confirmed bug and popes some times


> Posted by CurseForge user Aynni | Imported from CurseForge issue #1482 | Raw

comments.body:
Indeed, can't fix.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
